title: 求解AuthMe的数据如何迁移到MySQL
author: 桃渊林
txt_content: 最近弄好了BundeeCord,想把数据都迁移到MySQL上来，怎么弄

replies.author: 桃渊林
replies.txt_content: 刚刚又好了...还有AuthMe在一个服务器改好了密码,另外一个服怎么不生效

replies.author: 桃渊林
replies.txt_content:
omingyyfy 发表于 2015-4-6 12:00
怎么解决的
AuthMe-reloaded自从3.5版本起，添加了converter工具。这个工具可以把文件数据库转为一个sql格式的文件，，在MySQL创建一个账户(可以叫authme),然后创建个数据库(可以命名为authme),然后把用户authme添加数据库的所有权限，在把那个sql文件导入进去(推荐phpmyadmin非常简单便捷，需要php)
至于用法:/converter flattosql,在authme文件夹下会自动生成一个sql文件，导入它到你建立的数据库里，然后开始对authme的配置进行配置:
DataSource:
    # Column for storing or checking players nickname
    mySQLColumnName: username
    # Table of the database
    mySQLTablename: authme
    # Username about Database Connection Infos
    mySQLUsername: authme
    # Can be set to : file, sqlite, mysql
    backend: file
    # Column for storing players lastlogins
    mySQLColumnLastLogin: lastlogin
    # Database Name, use with converters or as SQLITE database name
    mySQLDatabase: authme
    # Database Port
    mySQLPort: '3306'
    # Column for storing players IPs
    mySQLColumnIp: ip
    # Database location
    mySQLHost: 127.0.0.1
    # Column for storing players passwords
    mySQLColumnPassword: password
    # Password about Database Connection Infos
    mySQLPassword: '12345'
    # Do we need to cache all query?
    caching: true
    # Column for SaveQuitLocation - X
    mySQLlastlocX: x
    # Column for SaveQuitLocation - Y
    mySQLlastlocY: y
    # Column for SaveQuitLocation - Z
    mySQLlastlocZ: z
    # Column for SaveQuitLocation - World name
    mySQLlastlocWorld: world
    # Column for storing players emails
    mySQLColumnEmail: email
    # Column of IDs to sort data
    mySQLColumnId: id
    # Column for Saving if a player is logged in or not
    mySQLColumnLogged: isLogged
复制代码
然后，配置好了，数据库导入完了，就可以了
